Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Dating: PTOLEMAIC PERIOD (not after); ROMAN PERIOD (not before)
Technique: FORMED BY HAND; PRESSED IN A FORM/MODEL
Name: Animal figurine
Description: This terracotta has been identified as a standing bird, the two legs of which would have rested on a circular pedestal. The identifying characteristics of the object have disappeared. The two wings, the tail and the head are missing.
